00026   function tbman($querystring)
00027   {
00028     $this->tablename=$this->get_tablename_from_query($querystring);

00032     if(!$result) {                             // and allows to put custom error messages like this one - Error: (used here)
00033         displayerror("Error(tbman_renderer.lib.php): ".mysql_error());
00034         return;
00035     }
00036           else
00037       $this->result=$result;

00168  
00169   function get_tablename_from_query($query)
00170   {
00171   //selection of tablename-
00172     $a=strtok($query,' ');
00173     while(is_string($a)) 
00174       { 
00175         if($a)
00176           { 
00177             if (strtolower($a)!='from')
00178               {
00179                 $a=strtok(' ');
00180                 continue;
00181               }
00182             else
00183               {
00184                 $a=strtok(' ');
00185                 break;
00186               }
00187           }
00188       }
00189     return $a;
00190   }
00191   
00192   function get_size_of_field($fieldname)
00193   {
00194     if(!is_string($this->tablename)) return "text_type";
00195 
00196     //making query to get info about the column named $key-
00197                 /*mysql_field_len($result,$key).*/    
00198     $b=mysql_fetch_assoc(mysql_query("explain ".$this->tablename." '".$fieldname."'"));
00199 
00200     $a=$b['Type'];//gives datatype of this format - varchar(20)
00201         if($a=="text") return "text_type";
00202     $a=substr($a,strpos($a,'(')+1,strpos($a,')')-strpos($a,'(')-1);//extracting 20 out of varchar(20)
00203 
00204     if(!is_string($a)) return 15;
00205     else if ($a>15) return 15; 
00206     return $a;
00207   }
